abstract: The company said its net income in the third quarter grew 48.6 percent, year over year, aided by political advertising.
snippet: The company said its net income in the third quarter grew 48.6 percent, year over year, aided by political advertising.
lead_paragraph: The Gannett Company reported a major rise in third-quarter profit on Monday, largely because of an infusion of political advertising at its television stations, which nearly doubled in number after the absorption of the Belo Corporation’s stations bought last year.

headline.main: Gannett Reports Big Rise in Profit Fueled by TV Revenue
